author: mrmitch
title: Motorcycle stands up on its own
review: Cheap set around $4.00 and it fits in with the Jack Stone sized figures and the other 4 Juniors sets. The chrome muffler is cool. Few pieces to this set and my litte boy love pulling over the other cars in Lego town with this motorcycle cop. If you have young one or Jack Stone & 4 Junior sets this is a set you should think about adding to your town.

author: BobaFett2
title: It's not bad for it's type...but it's too juniorized...any reason that they shouldn't get normal figures?
review:
The Police Motorcycle (I have no idea how I got it) is a wierd set. It's cool, but it's really lacking in some aspects. The cool is mostly just juniorization.

Pros

  • It's got a nice exhaust pipe piece

Cons

  • Juniorized
  • One of the worst part values for price
    Large Figure
I would not recommend this set unless you aim to make a town in large figure scale. Then it may actually be useful.

author: thedavid
title: it's fun for kids 5/ 7
review:
This set is a classic police set. every kid want it. It's simplistic and fun to play. If you are looking for a bithday-present. You found it now. The pieces are almost the same as the police motor cycle wich is now n stores. Every year there is somesthing like this. You can build it easy. that's good for children who are 5/ 7 years old, and the pieces are big so they can't eat it but i think the figure is not so nice. the helmet makes the figure look angry. It looks like a villian. Not like a brave policeman.

 

conclusion:

The set is not nice if you are 10/13

but if you are 5/ 7 it's very nice
